SEQanswers - 生物信息学https://www.seqanswers.com/下一代测序相关生物信息学的讨论：资源、算法、开源工作等zh 2023 年 12 月 28 日星期四 06:21:44 GMT v公告60图片/misc/rss.png SEQanswers - 生物信息学https://www.seqanswers.com/ CITE-seq 分析教程https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325345-cite-seq-analysis-tutorials Sun, 24 Dec 2023 21:21:32 GMT嗨，生物信息学爱好者，我整理了 4 篇关于 CITE-seq 分析的博客文章：第 1 部分如何使用 Salmon/Alevin 预处理 CITE-seq 数据... Hi Bioinformatics lovers,

我整理了 4 篇关于 CITE-seq 分析的博客文章：

第 1 部分 如何使用 Salmon/Alevin 预处理 CITE-seq 数据《divingintogenicsandgenomics.com/post/how-to-use-salmon-alevin-to-preprocess-cite-seq-data/ 》

第 2 部分 CITE-seq 下游分析：从 Alevin 输出到 Seurat 可视化

digiintogenicsandgenomics.com/post/cite-seq-downstream-analysis-from-alevin-output-to-seurat-visualization/

第 3 部分 CITE-seq 蛋白质计数数据的中心对数比 (CLR) 归一化 into Geneticsandgenomics.com/post/details-in-centered-log-ratio-clr-normalization-for-cite-seq- Protein-count-data/

第 4 部分 使用带有 dsb 包的空液滴进行 CITE-seq 标准化divivingintogenicsandgenomics.com/post/part-4-cite-seq-normalization-using-empty-droplets-with-the-dsb-package/

快乐学习！
汤米
​; 生物信息学疯狂的热汤米https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325345-cite-seq-analysis-tutorials BWA-MEM2 中的对齐分数计算https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325330-alignement-score-calculation-in-bwa-mem2 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 12:38:07 GMT大家好，有谁知道 BWA-MEM2 中的读取质量是如何过滤的？确切的公式是什么？如何过滤读数？我猜是... Hi everyone,

有谁知道 BWA-MEM2 中的读取质量如何过滤？确切的公式是什么？如何过滤读数？我猜这个公式就是这样的：
匹配*分数 + 不匹配*分数 + 差距*分数
但我还无法证实这一点。我想某处有文档，但我不知道它在哪里......

感谢您的帮助。​​; 生物信息学波莉https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325330-alignement-score-calculation-in-bwa-mem2 The reads I see on IGV doesn't match the counts I have. https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325328-the-reads-i-see-on-igv-doesn-t-match-the-counts-i-have Tue, 19 Dec 2023 23:58:53 GMT我使用 kallistogenomebam 对搁浅的单端和双端数据进行伪对齐并生成 bam 文件。我将我的 bam 文件可视化... I used kallisto genomebam to perform pseudoalignment on stranded single-end and paired-end data and generated bam files. I visualized my bam files on IGV and compared them to the counts I got from kallisto/tximport and they don't match up. Sometimes my count would say 0 but I see reads on IGV or it says there are thousands of reads but I don't see anything on IGV. Has anyone else encountered this issue and resolved it? Also what does the direction of the reads indicate? I have reads that go in the same and opposite direction as my genes. Also, for my stranded paired-end data, why do I have LR and RL reads? I was reading that RL means duplication or translocation; is that always the explanation? 生物信息学耶玛https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325328-the-reads-i-see-on-igv-doesn-t-match-the-counts-i-have 教程 基因组学和转录组学的七个基本生物信息学工具https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325287-tutorial-7-essential-bioinformatics-tools-for-genomics-and-transcriptomics Sun, 10 Dec 2023 18:28:48 GMT嗨，生物信息学爱好者，基因组学和转录组学的七个基本生物信息学工具 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=URYuMLLWfVA ... 疯狂热辣​; 生物信息学疯狂的热汤米https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325285-tutorial-download-metadata-from-geo-using-geoquery 什么情况下使用 IGV 检测反转时有 RR 读取但没有 LL 读取？ https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325255-in-what-c​​ase-there-are-rr-reads-but-no-ll-reads-when-detect-inversions-using- IGV Fri, 01 Dec 2023 15:00:40 GMT大家好，摘自《综合基因组学查看器用户指南》（双端比对 - IGV 桌面应用程序... 大家好，
根据 Integrative Genomics Viewer 用户指南（ 配对末端比对 - IGV 桌面应用程序​），当配对末端读数中出现倒位时，应该同时存在 RR 读数和 LL 读数。如下所示。

当我使用Illumina配对读数的方向来检测倒位时，我发现一个区域只有RR读数，见下图。我使用按对方向进行颜色对齐，并在分屏中查看配合区域。我不知道什么情况会导致这种情况。期待获得帮助。
; 生物信息学经芳https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325255-in-what-c​​ase-there-are-rr-reads-but-no-ll-reads-when-detect-inversions-using- IGV
